games.gameTitle: Pokemon Violet + The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero DLC
games.gameDescription: Pokémon Violet bundled with The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero features all the exciting adventures in one package. Catch, battle, and train Pokémon in the Paldea Region, a vast land filled with lakes, towering peaks, wastelands, small towns, and sprawling cities. Explore a wide-open world at your own pace and traverse land, water, and air by riding on Miraidon.

Join Mario on a massive, globe-trotting 3D adventure and use his incredible new abilities to collect Moons so you can power up your airship, the Odyssey, and rescue Princess Peach from Bowser's wedding plans!

games.gameTitle: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
games.gameDescription: Step into a world of discovery, exploration, and adventure in The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, a boundary-breaking new game in the acclaimed series.
Hit the road with the definitive version of Mario Kart 8 and play anytime, anywhere! Race your friends or battle them in a revised battle mode on new and returning battle courses.
Escape to a deserted island and create your own paradise as you explore, create, and customize in the Animal Crossing: New Horizons game.

Gaming icons clash in the ultimate showdown you can play anytime, anywhere! Smash rivals off the stage as new fighters Simon Belmont and King K. Rool join Inkling, Ridley, and every fighter in Super Smash Bros. history.
Embark on an adventure in the Galar region, where you'll face the trials of becoming a champion and uncover the mystery behind the Legendary Pokémon!
Enter the Splatlands, a sun-scorched desert inhabited by battle-hardened Inklings and Octolings. Splatsville, the city of chaos, is the adrenaline-fueled heart of this dusty wasteland.

games.gameTitle: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom
games.gameDescription: An epic adventure awaits in the Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom game, only on the Nintendo Switch system. In this sequel to the Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild game, you'll decide your own path through the sprawling landscapes of Hyrule and the mysterious islands floating in the vast skies above.
Join bounty hunter Samus Aran as she tries to escape a deadly alien world plagued by a mechanical menace in Metroid Dread for Nintendo Switch.

Join Kirby in an unforgettable journey through a mysterious world in a delightfully epic adventure. Take control of the powerful pink puffball, Kirby, and move around freely in 3D stages as you discover a mysterious world with abandoned structures from a past civilization.

In a war against the Fell Dragon, four kingdoms worked together with heroes from other worlds to seal away the great evil. One thousand years later, this seal has weakened and the Fell Dragon is about to reawaken. As a Divine Dragon, use the power of Emblem Rings to summon valiant heroes from other Fire Emblem titles to stand by your side.

A vast world awaits in Xenoblade Chronicles 3, the next game in the acclaimed RPG series from Monolith Soft. Players will step into the roles of protagonists Noah and Mio amid turmoil between the hostile nations of Keves and Agnus.
The witch is back! A mysterious force is destroying realities, and only Bayonetta can stop it. Use devastating combos and demonic summons to slam, stomp, and slice through the forces of evil.

Swing, kick, spike, and bowl your way to victory! Sports are back with Nintendo Switch Sports. Have fun with friends and family as you use Joy-Con controllers to play Soccer, Volleyball, Bowling, Tennis, Badminton, and Chambara.
Team up with Mario, Luigi, Princess Peach, Rabbid Peach, Rabbid Luigi, and their friends on a galactic journey to defeat a malevolent entity and save your Spark companions.

Donkey Kong Country: Tropical Freeze makes its Nintendo Switch debut with all the fun and challenge of the original game, plus a new beginner-friendly mode that lets players enjoy this critically acclaimed adventure as groovy surfing simian Funky Kong.

Meet even more Pikmin (and Oatchi) on a planet full of wonder! These tiny, plant-like creatures are pivotal to your mission. From the get-go, you'll need to grow, pluck, guide, and overpower your enemies to save stranded explorers.

The kingdom has been ravaged by an origami menace! Join Mario and his new partner, Olivia, as they battle evil Folded Soldiers, repair the damaged landscape, and try to free Princess Peach's castle from the clutches of King Olly.
Defy the god of the dead as you hack and slash out of the Underworld in this rogue-like dungeon crawler from the creators of Bastion, Transistor, and Pyre.

Rise to the challenge and join the hunt! In Monster Hunter Rise, the latest installment in the award-winning and top-selling Monster Hunter series, you'll become a hunter, explore brand new maps and use a variety of weapons to take down fearsome monsters.

Luigi embarks on a dream vacation with Mario and friends upon receiving an invitation to a luxurious hotel. However, his dream quickly becomes a nightmare when King Boo reveals everything had been a trap to capture Mario and friends!

Forge your own path in Hollow Knight! An epic action adventure through a vast ruined kingdom of insects and heroes. Explore twisting caverns, battle tainted creatures and befriend bizarre bugs, all in a classic, hand-drawn 2D style.

You've inherited your grandfather's old farm plot in Stardew Valley. Armed with hand-me-down tools and a few coins, you set out to begin your new life. Can you learn to live off the land and turn these overgrown fields into a thriving home?

Help Madeline survive her inner demons on her journey to the top of Celeste Mountain, in this super-tight platformer from the creators of TowerFall. Brave hundreds of hand-crafted challenges, uncover devious secrets, and piece together the mystery of the mountain.

Dead Cells is a rogue-lite, metroidvania inspired, action-platformer. You'll explore a sprawling, ever-changing castle... assuming you're able to fight your way past its keepers in 2D souls-lite combat.

games.gameTitle: Ori and the Will of the Wisps
games.gameDescription: Play as the lovable guardian spirit Ori in this highly anticipated sequel to the award-winning Ori and the Blind Forest. Embark on an all-new adventure to discover the mysteries beyond the forest of Nibel.
A Hat in Time is a cute-as-heck 3D platformer featuring a little girl who stitches hats for wicked powers! Freely explore giant worlds and recover Time Pieces to travel between new worlds!
Cuphead is a classic run and gun action game heavily focused on boss battles. Inspired by cartoons of the 1930s, the visuals and audio are painstakingly created with the same techniques of the era.

Shovel Knight: Treasure Trove is the full and complete edition of Shovel Knight, a sweeping classic action-adventure game series with awesome gameplay, memorable characters, and an 8-bit retro aesthetic!

Pizza Tower is a fast paced 2D platformer inspired by the Wario Land series, with an emphasis on movement, exploration and score attack. Featuring highly stylized pixel art and a soundtrack that will make you want to keep on dancing!

Katana ZERO is a stylish neo-noir, action-platformer featuring instant-death combat and time-manipulation abilities. Slash, dash, and manipulate time to unravel your past in a brutally difficult game.
UNDERTALE! The RPG game where you don't have to destroy anyone. Each enemy can be defeated nonviolently. Dance with a slime. Pet a dog. Whisper your favorite secret to a knight.
Dig, fight, explore, build! Nothing is impossible in this action-packed adventure game. The world is your canvas and the ground itself is your paint.
Echoes of a dark and violent past resonate throughout a savage land, steeped in treasure and blood. Hyper Light Drifter is an action adventure RPG in the vein of the best 16-bit classics.

Enter the Gungeon is a bullet hell dungeon crawler following a band of misfits seeking to shoot, loot, dodge roll and table-flip their way to personal absolution by reaching the legendary Gungeon's ultimate treasure.

This is the action-adventure you've been waiting decades for. After a lab accident, a scientist awakens in a mysterious, alien world. Is this a distant planet? The far future? Or a complex virtual-reality computer simulation?

Risk of Rain Returns is a remaster of the classic multiplayer roguelike. Play solo or with up to four friends in this chaotic adventure. With each run, earn experience to unlock new characters, items, and stages.
Spelunky 2 builds upon the unique, randomized challenges that made the original a roguelike classic, offering a huge adventure designed to satisfy players old and new.

Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night is a gothic horror action side-scrolling RPG set in 19th century England. A paranormal force has summoned a demon-infested castle, revealing crystal shards infused with tremendous magical power.

As a demon army besieges his village, a young ninja ventures through a cursed world, to deliver a scroll paramount to his clan's survival. What begins as a classic action platformer soon unravels into an expansive time-traveling adventure.
The forest of Nibel is dying. After a powerful storm sets a series of devastating events in motion, an unlikely hero must journey to find his courage and confront a dark nemesis to save his home.

Mario's most ambitious adventure yet! Explore vast cosmic worlds with enhanced gravity mechanics, stunning 4K visuals, and innovative Joy-Con 2 controls. Experience the power of Nintendo Switch 2 in this exclusive launch title.

The long-awaited return of Samus in her most immersive adventure. Built exclusively for Nintendo Switch 2, featuring ray-traced reflections, enhanced AI, and seamless world exploration like never before.
The ultimate high-speed racing experience returns! Completely rebuilt for Nintendo Switch 2 with 60fps gameplay, enhanced track design, and online multiplayer for up to 30 racers simultaneously.
Journey through time in this Nintendo Switch 2 exclusive! Experience the Johto region's ancient past with time-travel mechanics, enhanced creature AI, and seamless transitions between different eras.
The massive sci-fi RPG returns exclusively on Nintendo Switch 2! Enhanced with new story content, improved visuals, and the processing power to handle the vast world of Mira without compromise.
